definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: She came across a pile of old photographs while she was clearing the attic.
sentences.chinese: 她打扫阁楼时偶然发现了一沓旧照片。

sentences.english: Some colleges provide beds that can be lofted on their own.
In theaters, the loft is the area above and Behind the proscenium .
sentences.chinese: 剧场里的阁楼是在台口上面和后面的区域。

sentences.english: Bags and personal items may be left at the Cloakroom at Mezzanine level.
sentences.chinese: 书包与私人物件可被寄放在阁楼的‘斗篷室’。

sentences.english: One is called the City Center Lofts in Salt Lake City, Utah.
sentences.chinese: 一个称为城市阁楼，坐落在犹他州盐湖城。

sentences.english: It has a ghoul in the attic and gnomes in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 陋居的阁楼上有食尸鬼，花园里住着地精。

sentences.english: We're making our attic into an extra bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在把阁楼改装成一间额外的卧室。

sentences.english: She read it as she madeher way into the loft.
Each offers a spiral staircase leading to a loft with a two-person whirlpool.
sentences.chinese: 每提供一个螺旋楼梯通向阁楼一二人惠而浦。

sentences.english: So it had to be carried up to the attic and hung on clotheslines.
sentences.chinese: 因此得把衣服拿上阁楼，挂在晒衣绳上。

sentences.english: In my public houses by lease documents, note that a mezzanine floor.
sentences.chinese: 在我的公房租赁凭证上，注记有个阁楼。

sentences.english: He hanged himself from a beam in the attic.
sentences.chinese: 他在阁楼上悬梁自尽了。

sentences.english: How do you like the lofts ?
sentences.chinese: 你认为这间阁楼怎么样？

sentences.english: They persuaded Loeffler to let them have a sleeping-room in one corner of the loft.
sentences.chinese: 他们说服吕弗勒，让他们在阁楼的一个角落的卧室。

sentences.english: At noon, we had lunch, There were lofts of people.
sentences.chinese: 中午，咱们吃午餐，有阁楼的人。

sentences.english: Four bed-rooms and two garrets formed the rest of the house.
sentences.chinese: 构成小楼其余部分的，是四间卧室和两间阁楼。

definition: balcony/patio/flat roof/terrace/deck (unroofed platform)/outdoor stage/ancient imperial celestial observation terrace
top floor/attic/loft/garret/penthouse/(flat) rooftop (often used as an outdoor living area etc)
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
a room for keeping sth hidden/secret room/hidden chamber
upstairs/(Internet slang) previous poster in a forum thread
